channel.title: A Rs Serve Project
channel.description:
[center]Hello, My name is Mathias and i just think that computer started to be borring. So i been think i always like to code and make project so im gona start up a project. But i don't know what people like in private servers atm ? So i need one to help me with idears.
*Some infomation* I can self make webclient but i'm not a good to code client like adding models. But i'm good to codeing servers as well.
I have a running VPS Hosted in U.S.A 1000/MB. 512MB Ram Workrs fine can hold like 50 players or more.
So if you think you can help me i will be happy to hear from you.
Btw, Sorry for bad english, i'm working on it at school :P[/center]
If you wanna support me please click here:
*

item.title: A Rs Serve Project
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

noobs are ftw:

Well if it’s wl then it will fail with lag

Let him have the time to program it first. Assuming he hasn’t posted not a picture at the moment plus the required information; we won’t be able to criticize anything.

Good luck on the project.

Read full topic

item.title: A Rs Serve Project
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:2, topic:365480”]Ur vps will fail(needs more ram at least 2 gigs)
Practice ur English
Don’t use wl use hyperion

I can give more critique[/quote]

Yes, because RAM is everything.

@OP: May I advise you structure your posts in a more formal manner, also post images and keep the thread updated whenever possible/necessary.

Read full topic
